summary: Completed frontend testing of Acetaminophen (Paracetamol) Toxicity approach with collapsible sections, ml/mg conversion, and Bahrain-specific liquid preparations. All 9 test cases passed successfully.
passed_tests: Acetaminophen has collapsible sections with arrow indicators (▼/▲) that expand/collapse on click
Dose Calculator and Rumack-Matthew Nomogram sections are open by default (▲)
Acetaminophen has Tablets (mg) / Liquid (ml) toggle buttons - both modes work correctly

Liquid mode shows Bahrain preparations: Panadol Infant Drops (100mg/ml), Panadol Baby & Infant Susp (120mg/5ml), Panadol Children Susp (250mg/5ml), Adol Infant Drops, Adol Syrup, Adol 250 Suspension, Tylenol Infant Drops, Tylenol Children's Susp, Fevadol Drops, Fevadol Suspension, Calpol Infant Susp, Calpol Six Plus Susp, Custom/Other
Liquid calculation works: 30ml × 100mg/ml = 3000mg, shows 300 mg/kg for 10kg patient
Nomogram assessment works: 4h post-ingestion with serum level input shows treatment threshold comparison
NAC dosing calculator shows correct doses for patient weight (loading, bag 2, bag 3 doses)
Custom/Other option allows manual entry of concentration (mg/ml) with dedicated input field
critical_code_review_comments: Section.jsx component properly implements collapsible UI with arrow rotation animation (▼/▲)
LIQUID_PREPARATIONS array correctly configured with 13 Bahrain-specific preparations including concentrations
Dose calculation correctly computes totalDose = ml × perMl for liquid mode
Tablet calculation correctly computes totalDose = tablets × strength
Nomogram assessment uses linear interpolation between treatment line data points
NAC dosing calculations include 3-bag IV protocol, 2-bag IV protocol, and oral protocol
Custom/Other option properly shows concentration input field when selected
data-testid attributes properly implemented: apap-liquid-selector, apap-ml-input, apap-tablets-input, apap-amount-input, apap-hours-input, apap-level-input
Colors use muted Tailwind variants (bg-red-50, bg-amber-50, bg-green-50) for subtle appearance
context_for_next_testing_agent: Acetaminophen (Paracetamol) Toxicity approach updated with: 1) Collapsible sections using Section.jsx component with ▼/▲ arrows, 2) Tablets (mg) / Liquid (ml) toggle buttons, 3) Bahrain-specific liquid preparations dropdown with 13 options. Liquid preps include: Panadol Infant Drops 100mg/ml, Panadol Baby 120mg/5ml (24mg/ml), Panadol Children 250mg/5ml (50mg/ml), Adol (same concentrations), Tylenol, Fevadol, Calpol, Custom/Other. Tablet strengths: 120, 160, 325, 500, 650, 1000mg. Toxic dose threshold: ≥150 mg/kg. Navigation: Login > Dashboard > Children > Approaches > Search 'acetaminophen' > Select Acetaminophen Overdose.
